Package balance_trees

Class RedBlackTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

java.lang.Object
balance_trees.BinaryTree<E>
balance_trees.BSearchTree<E>
balance_trees.BSTRotate<E>
balance_trees.RedBlackTree<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class RedBlackTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends BSTRotate<E>
RedBlackTree.java Implements a Red-Black binary search tree Red-Black trees were invented by Bayer with refinments (the color convention) introduced by Guibas and Sedgewick.
Author:
Koffman and Wolfgang
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • add

      public boolean add​(E item)
      Insert an item into the tree. This is the starter method of a recursive process.
      Overrides:
      add in class BSearchTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
      Parameters:
      item - - The item to be inserted
      Returns:
      true if item inserted, false if item already in the tree.

    • delete

      public E delete​(E item)
      Delete starter method. Removes the given object from the binary search tree. Post: The object is not in the tree
      Overrides:
      delete in class BSearchTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
      Parameters:
      item - - The object to be removed.
      Returns:
      The object from the tree that was removed or null if the object was not in the tree.
